attributes.action: Allow taekwondo as a single sport for gcse pe.
attributes.additional_details: I think taekwondo is a very skilled sport and is physically demanding, the olympics inspired people to start the sport (such as me) but i have jus found out i can not be assessed using taewondo for my gcse pe. I would really like to think that this can be changed.
attributes.background: For gcse pe you can not choose taekwondo as a single sport - this should be changed so that children have that option.

rejection.details:
The decisions about which sports to offer during P.E. classes in school is a matter for individual schools, and not for the Government or Parliament to decide.

In any case we do not accept petitions that do not include a full name. If you don't feel comfortable using your name you could get someone you know to start the petition for you.
